title: When you got to catch 'em all to be the best praiser

replies.body:
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/pokemon/images/e/e6/493Arceus_DP_anime.png/revision/latest?cb=20140927044203
Yes that dragon is my pet.

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/pokemon/images/e/e6/493Arceus_DP_anime.png/revision/latest?cb=20140927044203
"Hey man, atleast I'm not the arrogant lovechild of palkia and rayquaza."
{{champion:432}} I may contest this. Or I may play an instrument and get high like I normally do.
